alert.note: Alert for Alamosa Vicinity, Central San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Del Norte Vicinity, Northern San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Ft; Saguache County East of Continental Divide below 10000 Ft; Upper Rio Grande Valley, Eastern San Juan Mountains Below 10000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 26 at 12:50PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE IN PUEBLO HAS ISSUED A SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT FOR... Central Rio Grande County in south central Colorado... South central Saguache County in central Colorado... A snow band is currently dropping heavy snow around the Del Norte, Colorado area. Webcams show visibility dropping between 1/2 to 1 mile. Roads may become quickly covered in a slushy snow. If conditions worsen, a Snow Squall warning may be needed for the area.
